name: Black Sun (bluemeerkat)
description:
*** WORK IN PROGRESS ***

Made in two weeks for LOWREZJAM 2022.

A simple space combat game inspired by games such as Elite and X-Wing. Shoot down all enemies to advance to the next level. There are four stages in total.

Controls

move mouse
yaw / pitch
move mouse + right mouse button
rollleft mouse button
shootWspeed up
Sslow down
Qchange fire mode
Elaunch torpedo
SPACEselect target
